name: WWII Card Game
description:
(Game lunched on HTML is the last version)

Welcome to WWII Card Game ! 

(An Crazy Games Game made by Guilefilou)

An unique Card Game with research, battle and upgrade on a multiplayer game! 

(ONLY PLAYABLE ON WEB for the moment)

A simple game where you can play with your friend or just play with another player,

have strategy more than your enemys! Unlock researches that allow you to have more powerful cards! On menu, unlock some bonus!

(PROTOTYPE, GAME NOT PLAYABL! CAN HAVE SOME BUG!)

FUTUR DISCORD COMING!
